from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - max(c.values())

print(ans)
from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values()) // 2

print(ans)
import collections

n = int(input())
s = list(input())

c = collections.Counter(s)

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)
import collections

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in collections.Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)
